text: Ștefan Constantin Berariu (born 14 January 1999) is a Romanian rower. He won a medal at the 2019 World Rowing Championships.2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships results ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian male rowers Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for Romania
title: Ștefan Constantin Berariu
